txt.en:
'It gets tiring, keeping the peikko away from our post.  They are persistent, but it is not because they want to harm us.

'The Gauredain are surely provoking these beasts.  If we are able to intimidate their herd, the peikko will be so confused when the Gauredain come that they will lash out at them instead of us.

'Defeat the herd's elder, and her cries will surely disrupt the whole herd.'
'It would seem that for the time being, the peikko will let us go about our business.  Perhaps the Gauredain will not sleep so easily tonight.\n\n'However, much work remains to be done.'
The Snow Beasts have been forced out of the Lossoth outpost in the Western Tundra, but will return unless their matron is defeated.
The Great Snow-matron can be found in the western tundra.\n\nDefeating the Snow-matron will frighten the yeti herd and turn them against the Gauredain.
